settings.heading: We believe in creating jewelry that can last lifetimes.
settings.message: The pieces we design aren’t about what’s happening around you like trends and popular opinions - we create pieces that celebrate who you are.

Our brand concept is inspired by the circular notion of heirlooms and recycled materials. The transformation of gold from raw to fluid to forged makes up the pillars of the brand's organically formed messaging, the fluidity of personas in photography and intentional products.
